content: **this sock pattern was designed for the sock knitters anonymous group on ravelry as the july 2025 mystery sock or mock to fit the featured theme art & music ** the inspiration for these socks was the symphonic poem the moldau also known by its czech name vltava one of my favourite classical music pieces the pattern is divided into a series of four clues to be released on july 1 8 15 and 22 of 2025 because it is designed as a mystery no photos of the finished socks are present on the pattern page or in any of the clues please use a spoiler image as the first photo of your ravelry project page if knitting along in the mkal **size and measurements** women s s m and l to fit leg circumference 17 5 20 22 5 cm 7 7 75 8 75 leg length including heel results in 23 23 5 24 cm 9 9 25 9 5 foot length is adjustable **material** 1 skein of fingering weight yarn with a yardage of approximately 400 m 437 yds per 100 g size 2 25mm / us size 1 dpns or circular needle s for your preferred method to knit in the round 5 stitch markers cable needle darning needle **gauge** 32 sts /42 row = 10 cm/4 in stockinette stitch blocked
